fixtures.weather: 15mm of rain overnight. Forecast for today is windy with gusts up to 30mph, mostly dry with sunny spells, small chance of catching a shower through the day.
Windy. Mainly dry but windy day ahead. Possible gusts of 44mph. Average wind speeds expected to be around 23mph. Max of 6'C during racing. Will continue to monitor and update.

fixtures.going: Standard Gallop Master finish to standard
fixtures.weather: Mild overnight and through tomorrow. Rain forecast from mid morning but clearing to be mainly overcast into the evening. Strong southerly winds gusting at times but no concerns and all usual precautions taken with temporary facilities. Will continue to monitor through the day. Temp approx 12C
fixtures.other: Galloping available up to 2hr 30mins before racing on the Tapeta track. Contact David Attwood on 07860 274289 dattwood@southwell-racecourse.co.uk or Simon Davis 07787 521619 sdavis@southwell-racecourse.co.uk to book. £20 per gallop and £20 per stable if required. Stables will be provided on a first come first served basis but we cant guarantee as this depends on number of declarations. We would like to thank everyone for their patience during this difficult time.. The meetings will not be open to the public. We are only permitting owners, trainers, annual members and racing staff to be in attendance as we work to get the facilities back in shape. PLEASE NOTE THE FLOODLIGHT TRAFFIC MANAGEMENT SCHEME WILL BE IN PLACE. NO ACCESS TO THE RACECOURSE VIA ROLLESTON VILLAGE FROM 2HRS BEFORE THE 1ST RACE UNTIL 30MINS AFTER THE LAST. ACCESS DURING THESE TIMES VIA SOUTHWELL END OF RACECOURSE ROAD ADJACENT TO THE BP GARAGE.

fixtures.weather: 13mm rain overnight. Forecast: Mostly dry with sunny spells today (11'C). Rain and strong winds tomorrow (12'C). Sunny spells and breezy on Wednesday (11'C).
fixtures.other: The A22 is closed at Blindley Heath with a diversion in place ROAD FROM M25 clear despite road closed signs. Please check before you travel and leave additional travel time. There will be 8 owners badges per runner - please email Isabelle Mangan-Goldstein (Racing Executive & Trainee Clerk) imangan@lingfieldpark.co.uk or call 01342 831718 for any further information.

fixtures.weather: 8mm rain overnight Forecast:  Monday dry with strong winds. Further rain and strong winds Tuesday. Wednesday dry and bright with strong winds easing through the morning
fixtures.rail: Bend turning into home straight dolled out 5yds.  Bend turning into back straight dolled out 4yds

fixtures.weather: 35.6mm rain over the weekend. F'cast:-Dry start Monday (9*) with showers returning afternoon and overnight. Possible localised heavy showers on Tuesday (12*) with strong SW wind, clearing overnight for a Dry Wednesday (9*).

fixtures.weather: Mild Tuesday with strong winds and rain forecast from mid morning. Clearing to be a dry and bright day Weds but continued strong winds. Thursday overcast with winds dropping but still brisk. Strong southerly winds gusting at times but no concerns and all usual precautions taken with temporary facilities. Will continue to monitor through the week Temps between 10-12C
fixtures.other: Galloping available up to 2hr 30mins before racing on the Tapeta track. Contact David Attwood on 07860 274289 dattwood@southwell-racecourse.co.uk or Simon Davis 07787 521619 sdavis@southwell-racecourse.co.uk to book. £20 per gallop and £20 per stable if required. Stables will be provided on a first come first served basis but we cant guarantee as this depends on number of declarations. fixtures.weather: Sunday temp high +14 a dry day 4mm of rainfall before midnight. Monday 2mm of rainfall early evening temp high +13 Forecast Tuesday strong gusting winds with rain late morning 3mm expected temp high +14 Wednesday dry temp high +11 Thursday predominantly dry overcast temp high +12

Cloudy. Min temp overnight into Saturday 3C, Sat pm into Sunday, 2mm of rain, temp 5C. Sunday saw a further 4.5mm of rain with winds picking up into Monday am,11C. 4.5mm rain throughout Monday. Further rain forecast Tuesday (5 mm) and strong winds on Tuesday and Wednesday. Drier on Wednesday and Thursday with chance of light drizzle. Temps remaining 10C during the day and around 4C overnight.
fixtures.rail: We will be operating with the usual shared 'A1' bend and split 'away' bends into the back straight. The 'A1' bend is located 23yds out from its official line. The Away Chase bend is located 15yds out from its official line and the Away Hurdle bend is also located 17yds out from it's official line. Race Distances affected as per the summary.
